# MPRepeatType.off

**Case**

Nothing is repeated during playback.

## Declaration

```swift
case off
```

## Repeat types

- **MPRepeatType.one**: A single item is repeated indefinitely.
- **MPRepeatType.all**: The current container or playlist is repeated indefinitely.

items.description: A single item is repeated indefinitely.
items.name: MPRepeatType.one

items.description: The current container or playlist is repeated indefinitely.
